original_title: LOLC Finance Ran Savi revolutionizes gold loan top-ups with iPay
original_body_lines: LOLC Finance continues to lead the way in digital transformation with the launch of its latest enhancement to the Ran Savi Gold Loan facility. The new Ran Savi Gold Loan quick top-up facility via the iPay app provides customers with a simple, secure, and convenient way to manage their gold loans digitally. With this breakthrough feature, LOLC Finance customers can now top up their gold loans, pay interest, and check their balances from the comfort of their own homes, eliminating the need for in-branch visits and making gold loans more accessible than ever before.

This new feature is a game-changer for gold loan customers who can now manage their loans entirely online. From paying loan interest to transferring funds and checking transaction statuses, customers can perform all necessary tasks with just a few clicks. The ability to top up a loan digitally gives customers more control over their financial needs, empowering them to access additional funds quickly and easily. Furthermore, customers who are already onboarded with iPay can apply for gold loan facilities and access this feature directly through the app, making the entire process hassle-free and 100% digital. New customers are also encouraged to join the iPay platform and become part of this digital transformation journey.

By offering a fully integrated and seamless digital experience, LOLC Finance is not only enhancing customer convenience but also fostering financial inclusion. Nishantha Jayasekara, Head of Gold Loans at LOLC Finance, shared,
